FType, Tool_Number, Tool_Name, FSTATE, FSpectification, FPrice, FActive_Date, FInspect_Cycle, FNext_Inspect_Date, FStore_Keeper, FScrap_Explain, FDESCRIBE, FCreatePerson, FCreateTime, FReservedOne, FReservedTwo, FReservedThree, FReservedFour, FReservedFive, TOOL_BASICS_ID
mapper.update:
update
set FType = #{FType}, Tool_Number = #{Tool_Number}, Tool_Name = #{Tool_Name}, FSTATE = #{FSTATE}, FSpectification = #{FSpectification}, FPrice = #{FPrice}, FActive_Date = #{FActive_Date}, FInspect_Cycle = #{FInspect_Cycle}, FNext_Inspect_Date = #{FNext_Inspect_Date}, FStore_Keeper = #{FStore_Keeper}, FScrap_Explain = #{FScrap_Explain}, FDESCRIBE = #{FDESCRIBE}, FCreatePerson = #{FCreatePerson}, FCreateTime = #{FCreateTime}, FReservedOne = #{FReservedOne}, FReservedTwo = #{FReservedTwo}, FReservedThree = #{FReservedThree}, FReservedFour = #{FReservedFour}, FReservedFive = #{FReservedFive}, TOOL_BASICS_ID = TOOL_BASICS_ID where TOOL_BASICS_ID = #{TOOL_BASICS_ID}
mapper.select: select ,f1.NAME FTypeName from f LEFT JOIN SYS_DICTIONARIES f1 ON f.FType = f1.DICTIONARIES_ID where f.TOOL_BASICS_ID = #{TOOL_BASICS_ID}

select ,f1.NAME FTypeName, CASE WHEN f.FSTATE='闲置' THEN '1' WHEN f.FState='占用' THEN '2' ELSE '3' END AS STATE from f LEFT JOIN SYS_DICTIONARIES f1 ON f.FType = f1.DICTIONARIES_ID where 1=1
and ( f.Tool_Name LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.Tool_Number LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FSTATE LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FSpectification LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' )
and ( f1.NAME LIKE '%'+ #{pd.TYPE}+'%' )
and ( f.FSTATE LIKE '%'+ #{pd.STATE}+'%' )
[fhstart] ORDER BY STATE,FCreateTime DESC [fhend]
